reports.title: Hi there üëã
reports.query:
This is an example dashboard that uses the [Beers and Breweries Graphgist](https://neo4j.com/graphgist/beer-amp-breweries-graphgist/).


**Check out the second tab of this dashboard ("Beers by Country") for some example reports!**

reports.title: Select a country
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`Brewery`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`country`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`country` as value LIMIT 4

reports.title: Beers
reports.query:
MATCH p=(bb:Beer)--(b:Brewery)
WHERE b.country = $neodash_brewery_country
RETURN  b.name as Brewery, p as Relationship, collect(bb.name) as Beer

reports.title: Breweries
reports.query:
MATCH p=(b:Brewery)--(x)
WHERE b.country = $neodash_brewery_country
RETURN p

reports.title: Graph View
reports.query:
MATCH p=(b:Brewery)--(x)
WHERE b.country = $neodash_brewery_country
RETURN p

reports.title: Beer Strengths
reports.query:
MATCH (b:Brewery)--(bb:Beer)
WHERE b.country = $neodash_brewery_country
RETURN bb.name as Beer, bb.abv as Strength
ORDER By Strength ASC SKIP 1 LIMIT 10
